info:
2025-11-23 Version 1.13
- Added more status MQTT outputs
- Made most flow.context variables global
- Moved the Meter Grid part to another flow

2025-08-26 Version 1.12

2025-03-21 Version 1.11
- charge_state, if unknown, add payload ID

2025-03-16

2025-03-08
- MQTT Sensors, more compatible with HASS (device class/measurement)

- Added Multiplus AC-In Power/Energy sensor

2024-04-27
